alert.note: Alert for Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 9:08PM MST until December 31 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Occasional light snow and cold wind chills. Total snow accumulations of an inch or two. Local amounts up to 3 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of North Central Wyoming and South Central and Southeast Montana. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be impacted by snow and localized blowing snow. Cold wind chills of 20 to 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are expected to remain near or below zero through the day on Friday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings
